ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards]  Charming
ygData.msgSnippet: Hehe F1 only works if you didn t remap your keys ;)  I was used to beta key mappings so my keyboard has been remapped to beta settings for ages.  I don t even
ygData.messageBody:
Hehe F1 only works if you didn't remap your keys ;) I was used to beta key
mappings so my keyboard has been remapped to beta settings for ages. I
don't even know what "F1" is supposed to be for :)

Lyrnia Jongleur
Bard of Norrath
<Travelers of Norrath>
